title: LP Point gain broken
body:
I am dropping with a 59% win rate.

Literally losing like 20+ points and gaining 14-15 per win.

I AM DROPPING WITH A POSITIVE WIN/LOSS RATIO.

TELL ME HOW PERFECT YOUR SYSTEM IS AGAIN I FORGOT.

replies.body: Hah. Rito knows u suck. They are stopping u from progressing.

Too many duo games! MMR might be inaccurate.

Also don't forget this is dynamic queue. Queue with some overrated jackers and pay the price.

Just because your overall win/loss is positive doesnt mean you're better than your current division. Whats far more relevant is your RECENT win/loss, since those are the games with/against people of your current rating.
